item.title: Bridge returned error 400! (18885)
item.content:encoded:
Twitter @Sanctuary4AllCO was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `The requested resource cannot be found!
Please make sure your input parameters are correct!
cUrl error: (0)
PHP error: `
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Twitter&context=By+username&u=Sanctuary4AllCO&norep=on&nopic=on&noimg=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

pmaziere
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoColorado Public Radio was live.WATCH LIVE: President Biden is touring the National Renewable Energy Laboratory in...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoColorado Public Radio was live.

WATCH LIVE: President Biden is touring the National Renewable Energy Laboratory in Golden and speaking about the infrastructure bill and the Build Back Better plan.
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Today President Biden will be at National Renewable Energy...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Today President Biden will be at National Renewable Energy Laboratory. He will be leaving Colorado at 5pm and it is a great opportunity for community to be present to send a message with all the topics that affect us. Community stand up and fight! 15013 Denver West Pkwy
Golden, CO 80401
United States
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Yess
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Yess

The Hudson County Correctional Facility in New Jersey says it will no longer detain people for Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE), Documented reports. Local officials had expressed openness to ending the county’s agreement with ICE this past...

dailykos.com

'Major win for the immigrant justice movement': New Jersey county says it's ending ICE contract

The Hudson County Correctional Facility in New Jersey says it will no longer detain people for Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE), Documented reports. Local officials had expressed openness to ending the county’s agreement with ICE this past...The Hudson County Correctional Facility in New Jersey says it will no longer detain people for Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE), Documented reports. Local officials had expressed openness to ending the county’s agreement with ICE this past...
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Gaby has been fighting for over a year in this country to be...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Gaby has been fighting for over a year in this country to be with her children. Support her struggle by buying tacos dorados de papa, flautas de pollo, or cheesecake. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

Gaby has been fighting for over a year alone in this country, has been a member for over a year at Sanctuary for All, and continues to fight to be here with her children. supports her struggle by buying food that week after week each family cooks lovingly for you.
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Please share and suport
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Please share and suport

Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

On Monday Lupe received a cancer diagnosis. She’s been suffering from a hernia for the last year, which has gone untreated because the hospital wouldn’t operate... on someone without health insurance. While monitoring the hernia, they discovered that she also has renal cancer. The full story and a link to her gofundme can be found at https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-lupe-pay-for-cancer-hernia-…. Please share, support, and pray for her full recovery. ❤️

See More
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.On Monday Lupe received a cancer diagnosis. She’s been suffering from...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

On Monday Lupe received a cancer diagnosis. She’s been suffering from a hernia for the last year, which has gone untreated because the hospital wouldn’t operate... on someone without health insurance. While monitoring the hernia, they discovered that she also has renal cancer. The full story and a link to her gofundme can be found at https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-lupe-pay-for-cancer-hernia-…. Please share, support, and pray for her full recovery. ❤️

item.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.On Monday Lupe received a cancer diagnosis. She’s been suffering from...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

On Monday Lupe received a cancer diagnosis. She’s been suffering from a hernia for the last year, which has gone untreated because the hospital wouldn’t operate... on someone without health insurance. While monitoring the hernia, they discovered that she also has renal cancer. The full story and a link to her gofundme can be found at https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-lupe-pay-for-cancer-hernia-…. Please share, support, and pray for her full recovery. ❤️

See More
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Jeanette Vizguerra, one of the amazing undocumented mothers in...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Jeanette Vizguerra, one of the amazing undocumented mothers in my film Sanctuary Rising, was in a scary car accident yesterday.

Amazingly she's ok, with family, and recovering now💗💗💗

Jeanette is going to miss a bunch of work, as well as have medical expenses--I wanted to ask for support from the community to help Jeanette and her kids to get through this difficult time.

...

Please Venmo Jeanette directly: @Sanctuary-4-All

https://account.venmo.com/u/Sanctuary-4-All

Mil Gracias:))) From Theo Rigby

item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

On Monday Lupe received a cancer diagnosis. She’s been suffering from a hernia for the last year, which has gone untreated because the hospital wouldn’t operate... on someone without health insurance. While monitoring the hernia, they discovered that she also has renal cancer. The full story and a link to her gofundme can be found at https://www.gofundme.com/f/help-lupe-pay-for-cancer-hernia-…. Please share, support, and pray for her full recovery. ❤️

Yessenia is expecting her third baby in October, and with the arrival of the new one she might take a step back from solidarity meals. Make sure to get some of her delicious tamales now, orders will be open until Friday! https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co
